attributes.action: Make insulin pumps available to all diabetics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By making insulin pumps available to all diabetics earlier in their illness rather than later, you will reduce the COST TO THE NHS by making diabetics more in control of their diabetes. Diabetics more in control of their diabetes are healthier. As found in countries such as the US of A and Israel this saves ALOT of money to the government, and means people are healthier

government_responses.details:
